instructions: Image titled Turn Off the Skype Camera on PC or Mac Step 16 1 Open Skype. If you re using Windows, you ll find it in the Windows menu s apps list. If you re using macOS, it s in the Applications folder. When a call comes in, you ll see a few icons appear near the caller s information. Image titled Turn Off the Skype Camera on PC or Mac Step 17 2 Click the green and white phone receiver icon. This answers the call with the camera off and the microphone on. Advertisement
